thread.title: Southampton 1 Liverpool 0 – five things we learnt: Daniel Sturridge won’t be starting again for a while with Philippe Coutinho back in the frame and Virgil van Dijk is hot as hell

author: wdownes
title: Southampton 1 Liverpool 0 – five things we learnt: Daniel Sturridge won’t be starting again for a while with Philippe Coutinho back in the frame and Virgil van Dijk is hot as hell
text:
EFL FIVE THINGS WE LEARNT Southampton 1 Liverpool 0 – five things we learnt: Daniel Sturridge won’t be starting again for a while with Philippe Coutinho back in the frame and Virgil van Dijk is hot as hell 
Jurgen Klopp wrongly reckons Daniel Sturridge only needs to stay fully fit to fulfil his potential and become a world-class striker by WALLY DOWNES JR
